scripts.//pretest: echo 'It will be run before test and will remove reports, screenshots, videos, and generate .json fixtures'
scripts.pretest: yarn run //pretest && rimraf -r ./cypress/reports/* && rimraf -r ./cypress/screenshots/* && rimraf -r ./cypress/videos/* && yarn run convertCSVtoJSON
scripts.//test: echo 'It will run cypress and record the results to the Dashboard'
scripts.//posttest: echo 'It will be run after test and will merge the mochawesome reports and generate an HTML'
scripts.posttest: yarn run //posttest && yarn run merge-reports && yarn run generate-htmlreport
scripts.//generate-htmlreport: echo 'It will generate an HTML report'
